alert.note: Alert for Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued February 04 at 3:21AM PST until February 04 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in areas of dense fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense fog will make it difficult to see pedestrians and bicyclists. Temperatures near freezing in outlying areas may result in spots of ice, which will be slick and difficult to see.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. If walking or cycling, wear bright or reflective clothing to improve your chances of being seen.
